en.title: IT Help Desk Technician
en.description: As a Help Desk Technician, I assisted users quickly fix tech issues and kept things running smoothly. I provided clear support and made sure problems were tracked so the team could work better together.

list.title: Key Responsibilities
items: Provided timely <strong>technical support</strong. and troubleshooting for hardware, software, and network issues, ensuring minimal downtime for end users.
Assisted with account setups, password resets, and software installations, improving user productivity and satisfaction.
Documented support requests and resolutions accurately, contributing to knowledge base improvements and efficient issue tracking.

en.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
en.description: Built and maintained web applications to improve the policy underwriting process. I worked across the stack using Java, SpringBoot, and HTML/CSS to create responsive, user-friendly interfaces. Collaborating with stakeholders, I helped translate business needs into efficient tools and ensured quality through thorough testing.

list.title: Key Responsibilities:
items: Built and enhanced responsive full-stack web applications using Java, Spring Boot, and modern front-end technologies to streamline policy underwriting workflows and improve user efficiency.
Partnered with business stakeholders and underwriting teams to translate functional requirements into scalable technical solutions aligned with operational needs.
Implemented comprehensive unit and integration testing to ensure application reliability, stability, and maintainability.

en.title: Data Engineer
en.description: Built scalable data pipelines and helped drive the migration from legacy systems to a modern, cloud-based infrastructure using dbt, SQL, and Snowflake. Integrated data from multiple sources to create unified views that supported analytics and decision-making. I also lead training efforts to help teams adopt and leverage our updated data stack.

list.title: Key Responsibilities:
items: Architected and deployed Snowflake-based data models using dbt, replacing legacy DB2/DataStage workflows and supporting $1B+ in mortgage originations while improving performance, maintainability, and deployment velocity.
Designed and delivered technical training programs to upskill cross-departmental teams in Snowflake, dbt, and modern data practices, accelerating adoption of the bank's cloud-first data strategy.
Engineered unified data models combining API and legacy system data, eliminating data silos and empowering cross-functional teams with a single source of truth for mortgage application analytics.
Designed and implemented scalable ELT pipelines to ingest, cleanse, and transform multi-source mortgage data.
